definitions.title: demonstr. part.
definitions.body: lo ! behold ! (BH [[הֵא]] (twice); Eg. Aram. and Têma [[הא]] (Cooke:193, 198); Targum [[הָא]]; Syr. ho0; Mand. [[הא]] (Nö:M 81); Ar. ha0 in Aram. also oft. prefixed to pr. 3 ps. for greater definiteness, as Targum [[הָהוּא]], huw (for hā-hū), v. Nö:M 89 f. W:CG 106 f.), Da 3:25.
